issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
I need to generate the eclipse plugin for hadoop 1.0.3.

I had lot of error while attempt to compile it, but now i'm stoked in this error i'm not able to solve:

-Hadoop 1.0.3 and Forrest 0.8
